channel.title: CVE Feed for Lucian Apostol -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lucian Apostol -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-25973|2024-08-02T11:39:06.519Z -- lucian%20apostol -- auto%20affiliate%20links
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Lucian Apostol Auto Affiliate Links plugin <= 6.3.0.2 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-22689|2024-08-02T10:13:49.881Z -- lucian%20apostol -- auto%20affiliate%20links
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Lucian Apostol Auto Affiliate Links plugin <= 6.3 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-34386|2024-08-02T02:51:11.409Z -- lucian%20apostol -- auto%20affiliate%20links
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Lucian Apostol Auto Affiliate Links.This issue affects Auto Affiliate Links: from n/a through 6.4.3.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-34386|2024-06-04T17:42:13.060Z -- lucian%20apostol -- auto%20affiliate%20links
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Lucian Apostol Auto Affiliate Links.This issue affects Auto Affiliate Links: from n/a through 6.4.3.1.
